casebody.data:
Jose HEREDIA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 4, 2018

Cheryl A. Juniewic, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Rita M. Shair, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

*567The petitioner Jose Heredia's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 906, 176 A.3d 1261 (2018), is denied.
